[Link to dataset](https://github.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/tree/1b43aa2f3f3eed83589b21f99bf7f20111934ac5/data/2020/2020-05-05/villagerdb-master)

Things you plan to investigate using this dataset:

- The species of the villager in relation to other variables (gender, personality?)
- The relationship between the reviews and the date at which they are posted
- The category of the furniture and the buy_value 

Stat 251 topics you plan to cover during the analysis:

1. Tidying data (removing NA's, putting data in order, etc.)
2. ggplot (plotting the data)
3. Data wrangling and joining columns and rows
4. using lubridate
